items.sentence: Everybody is supposed to wear a tie at the party.
Tom threw a rock at Mary, but it didn\'t hit her.
Tom told Mary he wouldn\'t let her go by herself.
I don\'t know whether you\'d remember Tom or not.
I should\'ve been paying more attention in class.
I\'m afraid I\'ll be stuck in this place forever.
I\'m not a teacher and don\'t want to become one.
Tom and his friends rode their bikes to the pool.
Tom asked for permission to use the copy machine.
Tom asks me the same thing every time he sees me.
